Posts.Content: Aug 21, 2014 12:05PM johnboy88 wrote: Thank you all for our encourgaging words!  It has helped a lot but still worried (my family always tell me I take things to the extreme:).  This is totally new to me, so forgive me if I ask silly questions.  I've tried to stay away from Dr. Google and other avenues.  But I do have a question.  What exactly is chronic mastitis?
Posts.Title: it starts again didette2006 didette2006

Posts.Content: Aug 20, 2014 11:49AM johnboy88 wrote: Good afternoon!  I haven't definately been diagnosed yet.  Will have biopsy on 08.28.  Did anyones breast hurt?  Mine did not until after the mammograph a wek ago.  Now it feels on fire at times.  Could it be from the pressing of the mammograph?  Could it be pyschosymatic.  Could I be imagining it now that it is assumed I have what could be breast cancer?  Do you become a hypochondriac?  I'm imagining all sorts of things.  I read about Inflammatory BC and now it feels as though I can feel the cancer going through my body.  I've been having headaches i thought was due to not wearing my glasses.  Now I'm think I have IBC and that i has spread tom my brain, lungs, etc.  I'm going crazy. Has anyone else experienced this.
Posts.Title: it starts again didette2006 didette2006

Posts.Content: Aug 20, 2014 01:34PM johnboy88 wrote: I've been fighting RA for over 10 years.  Had both knees replaced in 08/2008.  Left hip replaced 05/2012.  Need right replaced.  Had 2 blood transfusions.  Found a lump in my breast Sunday, 08.10.  went to dr on 08.12.  Had mammograph & ultrasound on 08.14.  Dr. said lymph nodes were swollen (3) on right side.  Checked left side and swollen there as well. Said could be from arthritis.  Not sure.  But I do have to have a biopsy on 08.28.  I attributed everything that hurt to my arthritis. Now, everything that hurts I attribute to IBC.  So scared it is because I ignored all types of symptoms.  I never did have pain in my breasts.  Now they hurt.  Don't know if my mind is playing tricks on me or what.
Posts.Title: it starts again didette2006 didette2006

Posts.Content: Aug 21, 2014 12:08PM johnboy88 wrote: I have also been battling cellulits on mt left leg since December, 2012.  It comes and goes.  Just had another bout.  Can this infection spread throughtout the body, creating symptoms?

Posts.Content: Aug 20, 2014 11:58AM johnboy88 wrote: I neglected to mention that I have severe rheumatoid arthritis.  Don't know if my lymph nodes are enlarged due to this or BC.  Frightening!

Posts.Content: Oct 11, 2014 06:31AM johnboy88 wrote: I have a question and forgive if I offend anyone by asking, but does cancer hurt?  My doctor says that cancer doesn't hurt unless it has mets to the bones.  For the past three weeks (after I had my biopsies) I have felt something in my back and it has started to hurt..not extreme pain just a little.   am afraid that the cancer has spread.  I am going for CT and brain MRI on the 16th of Oct. (my birthday is the 17th), and am terrified of the results.  I go the day before my 50th birthday.  I have asked my doctor not to call with the reslts until the following Monday.  I want to enjoy my birthday weekend as much as I possibly can.
